scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server-nest && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server-nest && npm run start:dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server-nest && npm install
scripts.render-build: cd server-nest && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json client/node_modules client/package-lock.json server-nest/node_modules server-nest/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:win: rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && rmdir /s /q client\node_modules && del client\package-lock.json && rmdir /s /q server-nest\node_modules && del server-nest\package-lock.json
